title: How to Order an American Girl Doll Without Hair

steps.headline: Click on the "Shop" tab (click to agree that you are 18 years or older; even if you aren't, you're not buying anything via the website anyway).
Scroll down on the "Shop" page and click the "Doll Hospital" tag under "Let Us Help You," a tiny section at the bottom.
Scroll down on the page until you see the box explaining the American Girl dolls without hair that are available.
Out of the five options available, choose which skin color and face mold variation you want.
steps.description: Note that the number you choose is only for the skin and face mold–you can personally choose the eye color later on.

steps.headline: Locate the phone number provided in the box and call it.
Tell the employee on the phone that you would like to order a "Doll Without Hair."
steps.description: It's best to use the official term. If the employee on the phone transfers you to someone else or is unsure about your request, don't worry–not all employees are even aware they offer the bald dolls.

steps.headline: Let the employee guide you, but don't forget some bullet points to make sure you bring up during the conversation, if they don't first:
steps.description: You get to choose the eye color, so make sure you've selected it before the call has ended. If you'd like to add a hearing aid or pierce your doll's ears, they probably won't ask, so be prepared to tell them. If you're ordering anything else, be sure to tell them. You can add anything–even another doll–to this order; you don't have to wait and do that online or anything.

steps.headline: Place the order using a credit card.
steps.description: If you have an online account through American Girl already, inform them of this so you can skip giving them your address and other ordering info.

steps.headline: Make sure you get your order number, particularly if you don't have an online account.
steps.description: This is so you can track your package.

steps.headline: Your order is done!
steps.description: You do not have to go online to confirm. Tracking is available online, and often dolls without hair come faster than a typical American Girl doll, though don't expect it. Typical shipping takes around a week to a week and a half.

text: Visit the American Girl Website.  Click on the "Shop" tab (click to agree that you are 18 years or older; even if you aren't, you're not buying anything via the website anyway).  Scroll down on the "Shop" page and click the "Doll Hospital" tag under "Let Us Help You," a tiny section at the bottom.  Scroll down on the page until you see the box explaining the American Girl dolls without hair that are available.  Out of the five options available, choose which skin color and face mold variation you want. Note that the number you choose is only for the skin and face mold–you can personally choose the eye color later on. Locate the phone number provided in the box and call it. This number is: 800-628-5145. Tell the employee on the phone that you would like to order a "Doll Without Hair." It's best to use the official term. If the employee on the phone transfers you to someone else or is unsure about your request, don't worry–not all employees are even aware they offer the bald dolls. Let the employee guide you, but don't forget some bullet points to make sure you bring up during the conversation, if they don't first: You get to choose the eye color, so make sure you've selected it before the call has ended. If you'd like to add a hearing aid or pierce your doll's ears, they probably won't ask, so be prepared to tell them. If you're ordering anything else, be sure to tell them. You can add anything–even another doll–to this order; you don't have to wait and do that online or anything. Place the order using a credit card. If you have an online account through American Girl already, inform them of this so you can skip giving them your address and other ordering info. Make sure you get your order number, particularly if you don't have an online account. This is so you can track your package. Your order is done! You do not have to go online to confirm. Tracking is available online, and often dolls without hair come faster than a typical American Girl doll, though don't expect it. Typical shipping takes around a week to a week and a half.
